mapper.select: SELECT user_id, repu_type_cd, repu_type_nm, tot_repu_star_cnt, tot_cnt, avr_star_cnt, cre_dt, cre_id, upd_dt, upd_id FROM whale_tot_repu;

SELECT a.repu_type_nm, a.repu_sub_title, c.user_nm, c.thumbnail, c.user_id FROM whale_repu_mst a, whale_tot_repu b, whale_user c WHERE a.repu_type_cd = b.repu_type_cd and b.user_id = c.user_id and c.group_cd = (select group_cd from whale_user where user_id = #{user_id}) and c.cmpy_cd = (select cmpy_cd from whale_user where user_id = #{user_id}) and a.repu_type_cd = #{repu_type_cd} order by b.avr_star_cnt desc limit 1;
SELECT * FROM whale_user WHERE group_cd = #{group_cd} AND cmpy_cd = #{cmpy_cd};
